publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1019 Dr Jean Turner: Save Stobhill Campaignâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the Save Stobhill Campaign on its organisation of a successful Scottish Forum in Glasgow on Saturday 6 March 2004 and supports its objectives of protecting NHS services and thus sustaining communities throughout Scotland.
S2M-1019 Save Stobhill Campaign (lodged on 9 March 2004) Murray Tosh*, John Swinburne*, Ms Sandra White*, Fergus Ewing*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Michael Matheson*
S2M-1019 Save Stobhill Campaign (lodged on 9 March 2004) Elaine Smith*, Tommy Sheridan*, Dennis Canavan*, Mr Bruce McFee*

S2M-1019 Dr Jean Turner: Save Stobhill Campaign-That the Parliament congratulates the Save Stobhill Campaign on its organisation of a successful Scottish Forum in Glasgow on Saturday 6 March 2004 and supports its objectives of protecting NHS services and thus sustaining communities throughout Scotland. Supported by: Murray Tosh, John Swinburne, Ms Sandra White, Fergus Ewing, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Michael Matheson, Elaine Smith, Tommy Sheridan, Dennis Canavan, Mr Bruce McFee, Christine Grahame*, Robin Harper*
S2M-1019 Save Stobhill Campaign (lodged on 9 March 2004) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1019 Save Stobhill Campaign (lodged on 9 March 2004) Chris Ballance*
